it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.lim.model.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    THE GAME INSTANCE This class acts as a hub between the instance of the game (model) and the main logic in the controller package, it has links to the board and all the others model classes. It deals with all the low-level game management (little logic) in order to make the main controller slimmer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      Empty constructor, setters and getters are used to save and retrieve game from file.
      Game(GameController controllerCallback)
      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(GameController controllerCallback)
        Constructor. Sets starting age and turn. These go from 1 inclusive to their MAX value defined in the settings

      • isTowerMoveAllowed

        public boolean isTowerMoveAllowed(java.lang.String towerColor,
                                  int floorNumber,
                                  FamilyMember fm)
        This method checks if a player is able to put a family member in a tower on a specified floor. it checks if that floor is occupied, if there are others family members of that player in the tower and if the player has enough strength to perform the action
        Parameters:
        towerColor - the destination tower's color
        floorNumber - the destination floor's number
        fm - the family member performing the action
        Returns:
        true if the moved is allowed by game rules

      • isTowerMoveAffordable

        public boolean isTowerMoveAffordable(java.lang.String towerColor,
                                     int floorNumber,
                                     FamilyMember fm)
        This method checks if a specified move into a tower is affordable by the player performing the move. it also checks if is a purple card and has an optional cost to pick the card
        Parameters:
        towerColor - the destination tower's color
        floorNumber - the destination floor's number
        fm - the family member performing the action
        Returns:
        this.getPlayerFromColor(fm.getOwnerColor()

        public Card towerMove(java.lang.String towerColor,
                      int floorNumber,
                      FamilyMember fm,
                      int servantsDeployed,
                      boolean useBp)
        This method makes the actual tower move
        Parameters:
        towerColor - the destination tower's color
        floorNumber - the destination floor's number
        fm - the fm performing the move
        servantsDeployed - the amount of servants spent to perform the action
        useBp - is true if the player wants to pay the purple card with battle points
        Returns:
        the picked card

      • calcHarvestActionStr

        public int calcHarvestActionStr(Player pl,
                                FamilyMember fm,
                                int servantsDeployed,
                                int tmpActionStr)
        Calculates the strength to perform an harvest action. If family member is null, it means that this is a fast action provided by an immediate effect of a card.
        Parameters:
        fm - the family member involved in the action
        servantsDeployed - the servants spent to perform the action
        tmpActionStr - the action strength provided by a bonus
        Returns:
        the calculated action strength

      • calcProductionActionStr

                                   FamilyMember fm,
                                   int servantsDeployed,
                                   int tmpActionStr)

        Parameters:

        servantsDeployed - the servants spent to perform the action
        tmpActionStr - the action strength provided by a bonus
        Returns:
        the calculated action strength

                               Player pl)

      • giveFavors

        public void giveFavors(Player pl,
                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> choices)
                throws ControllerException

        Parameters:

        choices - the chosen favors
        Throws:
        ControllerException

      • calcEndGameBonus

        public void calcEndGameBonus(Player pl)
        this method calculates the single bonuses a player can have at the and of the game. These bonuses are not influenced by previous excommunications (maybe assets)

      • applyVpOnBpRank

        public void applyVpOnBpRank()
        this method is called at the end of the game and adds victory points to the first two players that have the highest battle points (first two on the military track)

        Parameters:
        pl - the player
        Returns:
        the answer
